Oak_Lawn.Chicago Ridge station:
Chicago Ridge is a station on Metra's SouthWest Service in Chicago Ridge, Illinois. The station is 16.6 miles (26.7 km) away from Union Station, the northern terminus of the line. In Metra's zone-based fare system, Chicago Ridge is in zone D.
The station is located just north of the Village Hall and Police Station on Ridgeland Avenue between Washington Avenue and 105th Street, and west of the B&OCT/IHB Railroad's crossing at grade and the Stony Creek Golf Course.
